DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : Evaluate feasibility T2 cartilage map MRI wrist correlate T2 mapping knee cartilage . Study protocol : Phase 1 . 10 healthy volunteer , Phase 2 . 10 volunteer osteoarthritis wrist , Phase 3 . 50 patient study routine MR wrist . MRI protocol : 3 T unit ( ( Signa EXITE HDx ) , T1 , T2 T2 mapping sequence axial coronal orientation .
DOC.brief_title: Wrist Cartilage - High Resolution Vivo MR T2 Mapping- Feasibility Study
DOC.criteria: Phase 1 . Age:1840 Phase 2 : No age limit , know OA preexist Xrays Phase 3 : No age limit , routine MRI wrist Phase 1 , 2 : wrist trauma/surgery All phase : contraindication MR : eg metal , claustrophobia , etc .
